LanguageData.SadjuukWoodenPallet.label: Wooden Pallet
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodenPallet.description: A Wooden Pallet, easy to build and allowing a standardized storage.
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerConduit.label: Power Conduit
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerConduit_Blueprint.label: Power Conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerConduit_Frame.label: Power Conduit (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukFirefoamPopper.label: Wall firefoam popper
LanguageData.SadjuukFirefoamPopper.description: Safety device poping and spraying a fire-retardant foam around itself.
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA.label: Wood Generator
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA.description: P : 1500W A very rustic generator, using water steam as source of power.
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA_Blueprint.label: Wood Generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA_Frame.label: Wood Generator (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA_Frame.description: P : 1500W A very rustic generator, using water steam as source of power.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD.label: Fuel Oil Generator D
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD.description: P : 2250W A rustic and simple fuel oil generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD_Blueprint.label: Fuel Oil Generator D (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD_Frame.label: Fuel Oil Generator D (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD_Frame.description: P : 2250W A rustic and simple fuel oil generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA.label: Fuel Oil Generator A
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA.description: P : 12000W A rustic version of the standard UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Good production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 15% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA_Blueprint.label: Fuel Oil Generator A (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA_Frame.label: Fuel Oil Generator A (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA_Frame.description: P : 12000W A rustic version of the standard UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Good production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 15% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB.label: Fuel Oil Generator B
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB.description: P : 12000W The industrial version of the UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Double injection system, double filtration system, High production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 20% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB_Blueprint.label: Fuel Oil Generator B (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB_Frame.label: Fuel Oil Generator B (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB_Frame.description: P : 12000W The industrial version of the UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Double injection system, double filtration system, High production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 20% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF.label: Armored Generator F
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF.description: P : 2250W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 35% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF_Blueprint.label: Armored Generator F (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF_Frame.label: Armored Generator F (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF_Frame.description: P : 2250W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 35% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG.label: Armored Generator G
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG.description: P : 6000W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG_Blueprint.label: Armored Generator G (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG_Frame.label: Armored Generator G (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG_Frame.description: P : 6000W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN.label: Armored Generator N
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN.description: P : 3000W Military 3kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN_Blueprint.label: Armored Generator N (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN_Frame.label: Armored Generator N (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN_Frame.description: P : 3000W Military 3kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM.label: Armored Generator M
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM.description: P : 6000W Military 6kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM_Blueprint.label: Armored Generator M (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM_Frame.label: Armored Generator M (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM_Frame.description: P : 6000W Military 6kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY.label: Large Fuel Cell
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY.description: P : 3200W Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY_Blueprint.label: Large Fuel Cell (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY_Frame.label: Large Fuel Cell (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY_Frame.description: P : 3200W Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV.label: Portable Generator V
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV.description: P : 750W A Diesel portable generator. Low capacity tank, low power but sufficient for most nomadic situations. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV_Blueprint.label: Portable Generator V (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV_Frame.label: Portable Generator V (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV_Frame.description: P : 750W A Diesel portable generator. Low capacity tank, low power but sufficient for most nomadic situations. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW.label: Portable Generator W
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW.description: P : 750W A military Diesel generator. UNSC standard, low capacity but portable, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW_Blueprint.label: Portable Generator W (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW_Frame.label: Portable Generator W (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW_Frame.description: P : 750W A military Diesel generator. UNSC standard, low capacity but portable, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX.label: Portable Fuel Cell X
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX.description: P : 800W A Portable Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX_Blueprint.label: Portable Fuel Cell X (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX_Frame.label: Portable Fuel Cell X (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX_Frame.description: P : 800W A Portable Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA.label: Solar Panel A
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 4X4.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA_Blueprint.label: Solar Panel A (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA_Frame.label: Solar Panel A (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA_Frame.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 4X4.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB.label: Solar Panel B
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 5X3.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB_Blueprint.label: Solar Panel B (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB_Frame.label: Solar Panel B (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB_Frame.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 5X3.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC.label: Solar Panel C
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 7X2.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC_Blueprint.label: Solar Panel C (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC_Frame.label: Solar Panel C (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC_Frame.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 7X2.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingBench.label: Metalworking Bench
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingBench_Blueprint.label: Metalworking Bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingBench_Frame.label: Metalworking Bench (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter.label: Bessemer Converter
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter.description: First inexpensive industrial process for the mass production of steel. Obsolete since the development of the open hearth furnace.
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter_Blueprint.label: Bessemer Converter (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter_Frame.label: Bessemer Converter (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter_Frame.descripti: First inexpensive industrial process for the mass production of steel. Obsolete since the development of the open hearth furnace.
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace.label: Open Hearth Furnace
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace.description: Furnace where excess carbon and other impurities are burnt out of pig iron to produce steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace_Blueprint.label: Open Hearth Furnace (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace_Frame.label: Open Hearth Furnace (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace_Frame.descripti: Furnace where excess carbon and other impurities are burnt out of pig iron to produce steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace.label: Electric Arc Furnace
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace.description: Furnace that heats charged material by means of an electric arc. Very high production rate.
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace_Frame.label: Electric Arc Furnace (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace_Frame.descript: Furnace that heats charged material by means of an electric arc. Very high production rate.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB.label: Metalworking Line
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB.description: The Metalworking Line is a very versatile production line to work the metal.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB_Blueprint.label: Metalworking Line (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB_Frame.label: Metalworking Line (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB_Frame.descripti: The Metalworking Line is a very versatile production line to work the metal.
LanguageData.SadjuukShaper.label: Shaper Tool
LanguageData.SadjuukShaper.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Shaper tool. Its most common use is to machine straight flat surfaces, but with ingenuity and some accessories a wide range of work can be done. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukGrinding.label: Grinding Machine
LanguageData.SadjuukGrinding.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Grinding Machine used to finish workpieces that must show high surface quality and high accuracy of shape and dimension. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukWeldingRobot.label: Welding Robot
LanguageData.SadjuukWeldingRobot.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A mechanized programmable tool, completely automating a welding process by both performing the weld and handling the part. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB.label: Assembly Line
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB.description: The Assembly Line is a production line allowing to assemble a wide variety of components.
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB_Blueprint.label: Assembly Line (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB_Frame.label: Assembly Line (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB_Frame.description: The Assembly Line is a production line allowing to assemble a wide variety of components.
LanguageData.SadjuukLathe.label: Metal Lathe
LanguageData.SadjuukLathe.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. Machine tool removing material from a rotating workpiece via the movements of various cutting tools. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukMilling.label: Milling Machine
LanguageData.SadjuukMilling.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A Milling Machine that removes material from a workpiece by advancing the cutter into the workpiece. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyRobot.label: Assembly Robot
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyRobot.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A multi-role robot capable of assembling, picking, and packing with a high endurance, speed, and precision. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery.label: Construction Machinery
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery.description: A very complex machinery capable of extracting silicon from the rock and coarsely refining organic elements to produce glass, concrete and asphalt.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery_Frame.label: Construction Machinery (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery_Frame.descr: A very complex machinery capable of extracting silicon from the rock and coarsely refining organic elements to produce glass, concrete and asphalt.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.label: Fuel Oil Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.description: Medium capacity Fuel Oil Refinery. Good efficiency, far from conventional industrial capabilities but known as reliable and versatile. The Fuel Oil has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 20% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA_Blueprint.label: Fuel Oil Refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA_Frame.label: Fuel Oil Refinery (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA_Frame.description: Medium capacity Fuel Oil Refinery. Good efficiency, far from conventional industrial capabilities but known as reliable and versatile. The Fuel Oil has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 20% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB.label: Diesel Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB.description: Medium capacity Diesel Refinery. The Diesel has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 50% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB_Blueprint.label: Diesel Refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB_Frame.label: Diesel Refinery (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB_Frame.description: Medium capacity Diesel Refinery. The Diesel has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 50% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC.label: Advanced Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC.description: Advanced Refinery allowing the production of complex components like explosives or liquid hydrogen. The Liquid Hydrogen has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 80% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC_Blueprint.label: Advanced Refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC_Frame.label: Advanced Refinery (building)
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC_Frame.description: Advanced Refinery allowing the production of complex components like explosives or liquid hydrogen. The Liquid Hydrogen has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 80% more efficient generators.
